title: Brit pound appreciates with high relative i rates

content.prompt: If real interest rates in the United States fall relative to real interest rates in Great Britain, which of the following will occur?

choices.label: British investors will buy more United States securities.
British exports to the United States will increase.
United States investorsâ€™ demand for British pounds will decrease.
The British pound will appreciate relative to the dollar.
